In England, in the seven days to 18 March, there were 464,025 new confirmed cases (820.6 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 11 March, there were 329,168 new cases and so the new cases have risen by 41% (134,857 extra cases). The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 23 March is 17,277,446 (30,552.4 cases per 100,000 population).
